question: The 7th Mega Food Parkof Modi's government was inaugurated in __________.
explanation: MITS Mega Food Park was inagurated at Rayagada, Odisha. It is the first Mega Food Park in the state of Odisha and 7th Mega Food Park operationalized in the last 3 years by the present government. This aims to give a major boost to the food processing sector by adding value and reducing food wastage at each stage of the supply chain with particular focus on perishables, Ministry of Food Processing Industries is implementing Mega Food Park Scheme in the country.
